channel.title: Whonixcheck gave up waiting after 60 seconds
channel.description:
THE HOST INTERNET CONNECTION IS WORKING WHONIX-GATEWAY WILL NEED A FEW MOMENT FOR BOOTSTRAPPING THE TOR NETWORK ?
NEED HELP TOR IS NOT BOOTSTRAPPING.

item.title: Whonixcheck gave up waiting after 60 seconds
item.dc:creator: Kodapa
item.description:
Check if your time/date are correct. I just had this same issue and fixed this way.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonixcheck gave up waiting after 60 seconds

item.title: Whonixcheck gave up waiting after 60 seconds
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Could be an issue with VirtualBox. Can you try please if you get a non-Whonix VM to work in VirtualBox? Such as running Debian in a VirtualBox VM?

See this chapter:

Whonix – 7 May 20

Troubleshooting - Whonix

Troubleshooting Installation and Network Issues with Whonix ™

That has to be fixed first. Re-install of VirtualBox could work. If you said “no” during VirtualBox network driver install, it won’t work.

By the way, in case you haven’t noticed yet, we advice against using Windows hosts anyhow.

Whonix – 18 Jun 19

Computer Security Education - Whonix

THIS WIKI PAGE IS DEPRECATED AND OUTDATED. PLEASE REFER TO THE COMPUTER SECURITY EDUCATION SECTION - https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

Read full topic
item.source: Whonixcheck gave up waiting after 60 seconds

item.title: Whonixcheck gave up waiting after 60 seconds
item.dc:creator: tedxsam21
item.description:
1. the host internet connection is working

  2. says whonix gateway will need a few moments for bootstrapping the tor network and never does

  3. I did start whonix-gateway beforehand

RECOMMENDATIONS

  1. tried whonix check and didnt work and bash -xwhonixcheck --verbose

2 and ran whonix check on whonix-gateway NOTHING IS WORKING. I NEED HELP

Read full topic

item.title: Whonixcheck gave up waiting after 60 seconds
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
[quote=“tedxsam21, post:1, topic:766”]THE HOST INTERNET CONNECTION IS WORKING
WHONIX-GATEWAY WILL NEED A FEW MOMENT FOR BOOTSTRAPPING THE TOR NETWORK ?

NEED HELP TOR IS NOT BOOTSTRAPPING.[/quote]

[quote=“tedxsam21”]BOOTSTRAPPING 0% DONE AND THE HOS INTERNET CONNECTION IS WORKING.

NEED HELP PLEASE[/quote]

Please answer the questions that whonixcheck asked, that you just saw in that window.

Don’t use all upper case.

Read full topic
